name: Trash Panda (Apostate Games)
description:
Collect all the things to win!  Save your babies , clean up all the trash, and most importantly, find all the potatoes! Talk to NPCs by walking up to them for hints on the location of precious potatoes. Use your tail to activate/interact with things in the environment (including trash cans to get more trash).

Made for Potato Game Jam 2020.

NOTE:  Most 3D assets and sound effects/music are public domain or free/purchased assets on the unity 3d store or opengameart.org - Main character is original as well as  a some scene assets. All coding is original (first time using Unity 3D for a jam as well) - Intended to have enemies but ran out of time. Also it is possible to collect more than the necessary trash (bug with trash that drops from trash cans)
